query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Software State of the Art
result.description: An in-depth overview of the available software solutions in the domain of the projectâ€™s needs is necessary for MICADO as an initiative that will use Open Source components. This will be achieved by building on the overview created in T 2.3 and extending it to provide a proper overview of technological features for specialised ICT-audiences. Following a consolidated overall vision of the project, software assessment will be made to sort out the best of breed and most fitting options for the project to adopt.

result.title: Report on the impact of energy prices and other policies on energy-saving innovation and technology adoption in the manufacturing sector based on French company data
result.description: The deliverable will present the analysis of the impact of energy prices on innovation and technology adoption in the manufacturing sector in France and how it influences the competitiveness (measured for example by profitability) and international trade of this sector. The analysis will be based on the micro-data from series of firm-level datasets (e.g. Annual Survey on Energy Consumption in the Industry, CIS, PATSTAT, Unified Corporate Statistics System, etc.) and will be conducted under Sub-task 3.3.2.

result.title: Results of SULP definition
result.description: Based on regional logistics context analysis, Sustainable Urban Logistic Plan for each pilot city (Madeira, Las Palmas, Rethymno, Elba, Limassol and Malta) will be produced including the identification of measures and priorities, ICT supporting tools, implementation plan and short/medium-term timelines, result indicators, budget plan, enforcement methods. SULP will be carried out as integrated part of the whole SUMP (WP2). The report will detail the results of SULP definition for all the sites as an output of T5.3.

result.description: This report will include the philosophy, methods, findings and conclusions from the work on novel materials for railway vehicle running gear. This will include description of carbon fibre composites, additive manufacturing and any other materials considered in the project. It will also include modelling techniques developed for design and assessment of the novel material solutions.

project.title: Innovative RUNning gear soluTiOns for new dependable, sustainable, intelligent and comfortable RAIL vehicles

result.title: Description of methods for characterising suspension elements
result.description: This deliverable will report results of modelling and test methods for characterising suspension elements including shock absorbers, air springs and coil springs.
